name: FXEncoderBot
description: A Normal Telegram Bot Which can Compress using FFMPEG.

APP_ID.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather, and enter it's api token here.

AUTH_CHATS.description: Get Ids of Authorised Chats from Telegram and Paste Here. USE Space for Multiple.

SUDO_USERS.description: Get Ids of Authorised Users from Telegram and Paste Here. USE Space for Multiple.

THUMBNAIL.description: Put Telegraph Link of any picture Externally.

FFMPEG.description: Put your FFMPEG code as Externally.
FFMPEG.value: ffmpeg -i '''{}''' -preset fast -c:v libx265 -s 846x480 -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 32 -map 0:v -c:a libfdk_aac -profile:a aac_he_v2 -map 0:a -vbr 2 -c:s copy -map 0:s? '''{}''' -y

START_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First

PING_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First

HELP_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First

LOG_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First

DL_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First

ENCODE_CMD.description: Put Custom Bot Command, Give Username Along with Command to Use it in Groups. Do Not Add '/' in the First
